none: No recommendations could be found for the selected branch(es).

pull-upstream.title: Out of date
pull-upstream.description: The branch '{{branch}}' is out of date with at least one upstream.

conflict.title: Incoming conflicts
conflict.description: The branch '{{branch}}' is out of date with '{{incoming}}', which has conflicts.

conflict-upstream.title: Upstream conflicts
conflict-upstream.description: The branch '{{branch}}' further upstream has conflicts. Resolve those before continuing.

reintegrate.title: Reintegrate integration branch
reintegrate.description: An integration branch '{{integration}}' is downstream from a branch with incoming conflicts '{{branch}}'. Merging the integration branch may resolve those conflicts.

remove-unused-branch.title: Remove unused branch
remove-unused-branch.description: The branch '{{branch}}' has no commits ahead of upstreams, and has a single parent; if it is unused, it may be removed.

remove-invalid-integration.title: Remove invalid integration branch
remove-invalid-integration.description: The integration branch only has one upstream (or all other upstreams are upstream of that one). It should be removed.
